text: Angus MacLane is an American director, cartoonist and screenwriter who was one of the directors of Finding Dory and who also wrote and directed the movie Lightyear. It known for working at Pixar (1997–2023), and DreamWorks Animation (2024–present). Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:American movie directors Category:American animators Category:American screenwriters
title: Angus MacLane
